sys_script.name: Automatically add assigned_to

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_momo_ratelock_ticket</collection><condition>gs.hasRole('x_momo_ratelock.ratelock_tech')</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_momo_ratelock_ticket">assigned_toISEMPTY^commentsVALCHANGES^state!=6^ORstate!=5^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assigned_to" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item display_value="Closed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="6"/><item display_value="Resolved" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="true" value="5"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Automatically add assigned_to</name><order>103</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions>x_momo_ratelock.ratelock_tech</role_conditions><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	current.setValue('assigned_to', gs.getUserID(), gs.getUserDisplayName());
	if (current.getValue("state") == 1) {
		current.setValue("state", 2);
	}
	current.update();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>douglas.schamberg</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-05 15:09:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5e17575f1b0e049048a242e58d4bcb0a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Automatically add assigned_to</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Ratelock" source="x_momo_ratelock">605affb71badc01048a242e58d4bcb76</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Ratelock">605affb71badc01048a242e58d4bcb76</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5e17575f1b0e049048a242e58d4bcb0a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>douglas.schamberg</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-08 12:45:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5e17575f1b0e049048a242e58d4bcb0a"/></record_update>
